name: shellcode_stager
author: jm33-ng
comment: A Linux shellcode stager that supports payload delivery via HTTP/TCP/UDP with encryption and compression. Use with emp3r0r-listener

LISTENER_TYPE.opt_desc: Listener protocol type: HTTP, TCP, or UDP

DOWNLOAD_HOST.opt_desc: The host to download the payload from, eg. 192.168.0.1

DOWNLOAD_PORT.opt_desc: The port to download the payload from, eg. 8000

DOWNLOAD_PATH.opt_desc: The path to download the payload from (HTTP only), eg. /payload

DOWNLOAD_KEY.opt_desc: The key to decrypt the payload
